title: Types of accounts and user profiles
content: User profiles in Emprez Emprez allows access based on the responsibilities of the different users of a company. Regardless of the type of access offered to a user, this user can only view information from the departments for which you have assigned rights.            A more detailed table of access rights is available by clicking here. Employee:Description of roles and access of an EmployeeEmployee file creationDelete an employee fileReactivate an accountReactivate an account (due to too many incorrect password attempts)Manager: Description of roles and access of the Manager Creation and modification of a Manager access Deletion of a Manager access   Administrateur : Description of roles and administrator access (ADMIN)Creation and Modification of a limited administrator account Create an Administrator access Please note that to delete an Administrator account, you must be an Administrator and contact our customer service. Helpful?00Updated: 4 years ago Share :
